column5: Getting geared up to head up to Nipissing for the weekend! cant wait.. I have a new Quantum PTi that I need to get lined up for her maiden voyage up north...  Now the question is.....  Do I line her up with 20lb PowerPro and a floro leader?  Or  Do I Line her up with FireLine Crystal? <----any good reviews on this stuff?  Thanks in advance!  Gerritt.
hey captain, i use a a Seagur Fluoro backing on my PT with a flouro leader as well. Using 20 lb PP.
I like the fireline crystal but have only used it in the 10lb test size so I can't comment on heavier sizes.
Go with the PP in 20lb test with a fluorocarbon leader, it'll be a great combo. Those Quantum spinning reels are definitely SUHWEET! Good fishing.

PowerPro gets the nod, and you can run a leader off of that, fluoro is not necessary.  Best part is you can gain practice with the uni-to-uni knot or the blood knot for joining your leader to the PowerPro.  Have fun! Tony
